name: Norog

skills.name: Maul
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 55% chance of decreasing the duration of all buffs on the target by 1 turn. Also has an 80% chance of placing a [Block Active Skills] debuff for 1 turn.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Damage Multiplier: 4 DEF

effects.stat: ATK|HP|DEF|MAX HP|ENEMY_MAX_HP|Turn Meter|NA|... (as needed, where NA is 'not applicable'. This allows schema validation. This value should not be null)
effects.duration: Duration of buff/debuff in turns (if applicable)
effects.notes: Describe scaling, conditions, or special logic. Use multiple objects for multi-component or conditional effects.

skills.notes: Additional notes (conditional effects, scaling, special interactions, etc.)

skills.name: Ice Pillar (Cooldown: 4 turns)
skills.description:
Attacks all enemies. Places a [Block Buffs] debuff for 2 turns and a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.
Level 2: Damage +10%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 3.8 DEF

skills.name: Thick Skin (Passive)
skills.description: Immune to [Stun], [Freeze], [Sleep], [Fear], [True Fear], [Provoke], [Sheep], and [Petrification] debuffs. Decreases the damage taken by all alies that are under 1 or more buffs by 15%. Decreases the damage taken by all allies that are under no active buffs by 25%.
